original_title: Kunst on ainus pääsetee. Konrad Mägi eluloofilm
overview: Marianne Kõrver's documentary is about the life and work of the painter Konrad Mägi (1878-1925). According to the author, when creating the film, she was primarily interested in Mägi's controversial and sometimes inexplicable personality, the various aspects of which are also transferred to his work.
title: Kunst on ainus pääsetee. Konrad Mägi eluloofilm
